As someone who plays FPS games for the competitive factor, it's about as good as it gets right about now. Almost brings me back to the glory days of playing Halo 3 and MW2. Besides the occasional hackers it's a great time. Don't solo que! Playing with a friend or two can greatly increase the value of this game.
